home.overview: Welcome to Connecticut Walk, a Townhouse Community located at 5310 Connecticut Ave. Townhouse #7 is a charming, recently updated 3 bedroom, 3 1/2 bath home, and is beautifully located less than a mile South of Chevy Chase Circle on DC?s most picturesque Avenue. The interior features a bright and inviting kitchen with quartz counters and stainless steel appliances, as well as an elegant dining room with a step-down into the main living area. At the South end of the living room are a pair of French doors that lead to a balcony overlooking a beautiful stone church across Jocelyn St. Custom built-ins flank the wood-burning fireplace. On the upper level, the master bedroom has an ensuite bath with updated vanity, lighting and fixtures. The second bedroom is spacious, and directly also has an ensuite bath. Second floor hall laundry stack provides convenience. Several skylights make the upper level suffused with sunlight. The lower level contains a bedroom and a generously sized full bath. Access to the garage is from the lower level hall. The house has been updated with features including new tile in the kitchen and powder room, vanities, bathroom fittings, mirrors, and medicine cabinets. LED recessed lighting and contemporary ceiling fixtures complete the package. The main entry is through a lovely, landscaped interior courtyard shielded from city noise. A single car garage accessed from a brick driveway on Jocelyn Street serves as your day to day access. The Garage is the full width of the property, so it provides ample spillover and utility storage space. With an L2 bus stop directly in front, you can ride ½ mile South to Vanness Metro, or ride it all the way to Federal Triangle. Walk a quarter mile North to Starbucks, shopping and restaurants. To the South a short walk gets you to Bread Furst and Politics and Prose. and more shops. A short walk to Friendship Heights shopping include Whole Foods, major retail, boutiques and Restaurants.Read more
